item.title: Turn the Page Feat. Sydtherockerkid
item.description: While my disputed copyright claim is under review at SoundCloud, I release my song “Turn the Page” hereâ€“along with details about the legal stuff.

item.title: Westworld Scoring Competition: Content, Process, and Relationship
item.description: How a high-profile music competition by Spitfire Audio and HBO with 11,000 participants ends in a PR disaster—and how distinguishing content, process, and relationship levels could help to recover.
